members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetSearchIndexItems gets the SearchInfo Items for the Portal
The Id of the Portal
[cnurse] 11/15/2004 documented [vnguyen] 09/07/2010 Modified: Included logic to add TabId to searchItems
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GetModuleList gets a collection of SearchContentModuleInfo Items for the Portal
Parses the Modules of the Portal, determining whetehr they are searchable.
The Id of the Portal
[cnurse] 11/15/2004 documented
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Namespace: DotNetNuke.Services.Search Project: DotNetNuke.Search.Index Class: SearchContentModuleInfo -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The SearchContentModuleInfo class represents an extendension (by containment) of ModuleInfo to add a parametere that determines whether a module is Searchable
[cnurse] 11/15/2004 documented
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Namespace: DotNetNuke.Services.Search Project: DotNetNuke.Search.Index Class: SearchContentModuleInfoCollection -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Represents a collection of SearchContentModuleInfo objects.
[cnurse] 11/15/2004 documented
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SearchContentModuleInfoCollection class.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.#ctor(DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SearchContentModuleInfoCollection class containing the elements of the specified source collection.
member.param: A SearchContentModuleInfoCollection with which to initialize the collection.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.#ctor(DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfo[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SearchContentModuleInfoCollection class containing the specified array of SearchContentModuleInfo objects.
member.param: An array of SearchContentModuleInfo objects with which to initialize the collection.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.Add(DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfo)
member.summary: Add an element of the specified SearchContentModuleInfo to the end of the collection.
member.param: An object of type SearchContentModuleInfo to add to the collection.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.IndexOf(DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfo)
member.summary: Gets the index in the collection of the specified SearchContentModuleInfoCollection, if it exists in the collection.
member.param: The SearchContentModuleInfoCollection to locate in the collection.
member.returns: The index in the collection of the specified object, if found; otherwise, -1.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.Insert(System.Int32,DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfo)
member.summary: Add an element of the specified SearchContentModuleInfo to the collection at the designated index.
member.param: An Integer to indicate the location to add the object to the collection.
An object of type SearchContentModuleInfo to add to the collection.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.Remove(DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfo)
member.summary: Remove the specified object of type SearchContentModuleInfo from the collection.
member.param: An object of type SearchContentModuleInfo to remove to the collection.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.Contains(DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfo)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the collection contains the specified SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.
member.param: The SearchContentModuleInfoCollection to search for in the collection.
member.returns: true if the collection contains the specified object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.AddRange(DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfo[])
member.summary: Copies the elements of the specified SearchContentModuleInfo array to the end of the collection.
member.param: An array of type SearchContentModuleInfo containing the objects to add to the collection.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.AddRange(DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection)
member.summary: Adds the contents of another SearchContentModuleInfoCollection to the end of the collection.
member.param: A SearchContentModuleInfoCollection containing the objects to add to the collection.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.CopyTo(DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfo[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional Array instance beginning at the specified index.
member.param: The one-dimensional Array that is the destination of the values copied from the collection.
The index of the array at which to begin inserting.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.ToArray
member.summary: Creates a one-dimensional Array instance containing the collection items.

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Services.Search.SearchContentModuleInfoCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Gets the SearchContentModuleInfoCollection at the specified index in the collection.
In VB.Net, this property is the indexer for the SearchContentModuleInfoCollection class.
